name: Ian

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: I'm a software engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in web development. I have a strong passion for building user-friendly, scalable applications, and Iâ€™ve worked extensively with JavaScript frameworks and libraries, particularly React for front-end development and Node.js for server-side development.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Led the front-end development team, Designed and implemented UI functionalities for a Messaging(using WhatsApp, Line and FB Messenger) and Property Technology platform using ReactJS and Next.js.,Transformed Figma designs into reusable UI components.,Developed a workflow automation UI using Reactflow,Built a REST API with Fastify, Node.js, and MySQL,Designed and created landing pages for clients campaign initiative,Addressed security vulnerabilities and conducted app audits with Lighthouse and Node.,Contributed to live server deployments using Bitbucket Pipelines and AWS Elastic Beanstalk.,Configured AWS Elastic Beanstalk instances and managed domains with Cloudflare.,Integrated third-party platforms including HubSpot, Salesforce, MindBody API, Transloadit, and Stripe.,Monitored performance and usability issues with Sentry and New Relic.

Led the front-end development team in executing features for each sprint in an Agile environment., Developed UI features for a Property Technology platform using Angular and ReactJS.,Ensured high code quality through regular code reviews and maintenance.,Managed the deployment of new updates to Firebase servers.
Maintained and developed modular components for an ERP system using Angular 6., Coordinated with offshore teams for design, testing, and integration.

Led the team and coordinated tasks across multiple projects,Developed consumer and admin portals for a reservation system using Laravel and Vue.js.,Created high-quality UI designs and RESTful APIs.,Integrated payment portals such as GCash and DragonPay.,Managed Linux Ubuntu servers for production deployments.
Developed a payment portal and membership platform using PHP/Yii,Built a platform for fiat and cryptocurrency circulation.,Created RESTful APIs for third-party applications.
Developed a high-performance website showcasing company services using Laravel and jQuery.
Developed a payment website portal using PHP and JavaScript.,Created a RESTful API for third-party consumer data.

education.universityPara: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
